review: Although it was toted as a easy to set up and easy to use product, it wasn't. It is working now but it took a good bit of time to adapt it to the T.V., get it up and running with Netflix and keep it casting. Perhaps it was operator error. I do know that at times itstops casting and everything has to restart. It's an O.K. product and as I said before it is working most of the time. For the priceit may be a perfect fit for others.
author: Ellen

review: A great little product that does a lot.
author: kevin campbell

review: My only complaint would be the lack of a crystal clear image on the tv screen. Would have rated a five if I didnt have to sacrifice the quality of the picture. Other than that,  it does exactly what it's supposed to do. Great for the price.
author: Olga

review: This is the device of the century.
author: Piyush

review: Love it!  Got it on a promo with a NAS HDD.  I have a smart TV and a Windows Media Center box, so I wasn't planning on getting a Chromecast.  There's very little it does for me that I didn't already have set up.  It has some cool features, though.If you don't have a smart TV, or are looking for a quick and easy way to "beam" content from your mobile device to your TV, this is it!
author: Garry Adams
